item.title: An Introduction to Multi-Armed Bandit Problem and Solutions
item.description: Multi-Armed Bandit Problem Imagine you are in a casionoand face multiple slot machines. Each machine is configured with an unknown probability of how likely you would get a reward at one play. The question is What’s the strategy to get the highest long-term reward? An illustration of multi-armed bandit problem, refer to Lil’Log The Multi-Armed Bandit Problem and Its Solutions Definition Upper Confidence Bounds(UCB) The UCB algorithm give a realtion between upper bound and probability confidence.
